title: Apartment for $1,000 with ALL bills paid!!!!!
posting_body: I own a plantation home with a fairly new garage apartment built on the same property that I wish to rent.
The main house is Historical dates to 1900, the garage apartment is ready now.
The property is located near downtown Eagle Lake Texas about one hour drive west of Houston, between Columbus and Katy Texas.
The idea person(s) to rent would be someone who works near Columbus/Katy/Sealy, or retired.
Eagle Lake Texas is just a nice town to live.
You only pay $1,000, I pay everything else.
Again, your total housing payment is only $1,000 and I pay for your water, gas, and light bill.
